An apology for the new separation in a letter to Dr. John Sharpe, Archbishop of York, occasioned by his farewell-sermon, preached on the 28th of June, at St. Giles's in the Fields. Hickes, George, 1642-1715.
[4], 16 p.
[s.n.], London : 1691.
Marginal notes. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
